results.content: This course will get you there responsively. It takes you by the hand and Kalob tells you upfront that if you know some development, then this course most definitely isn't for you. He doesn't beat around the bush and gets straight to the point explaining things.
results.content_html: This course will get you there responsively. It takes you by the hand and Kalob tells you upfront that if you know some development, then this course most definitely isn't for you. He doesn't beat around the bush and gets straight to the point explaining things.

results.content: This is a good, basic course.  Some practice exercises would have caused me to rate the course a 5 vs. a 4.
